item.title: #TIL 2018-03-01 : Prevent source hacking from .git directory exposing
item.description: Prevent source hacking from .git directory exposing Many web project use Git as source version control tools. So in production server, we could expose the hidden .git directory - which contains all most infomation about project source code. To “rip” a source code from a vulnerable website, we can use this tool : https://github.com/kost/dvcs-ripper#git So to prevent this happens, try to deny all http access to hidden files and directories (usually starts by .
